scripts.format-lint: npm run format; npm run lint
scripts.compile-common: cd ../common; npm install; npm run compile-tests; npm run build
scripts.compile-gcn: cd ../gcn; npm install; npm run compile; npm run test-compile
scripts.compile-micronaut: cd ../micronaut; npm install;  npm run compile; npm run test-compile
scripts.compile-micronautTools: cd ../micronaut-tools; npm install; npm run compile; npm run test-compile
scripts.compile-ociDevops: cd ../oci-devops; npm install; npm run compile; npm run test-compile
scripts.dependency-compile: npm run compile-common; npm run compile-gcn; npm run compile-micronaut; npm run compile-micronautTools; npm run compile-ociDevops
scripts.clean-resources: rm -rf test-resources; rm -rf .vscode-test; rm -rf mochawesome-report; npm run clean-projects
scripts.pre-test: npm install; npm run clean; npm run dependency-compile; npm run clean-resources; npm run compile; npm run generate
scripts.jenkins-pre-test: npm install; npm run clean; npm run dependency-compile; npm run clean-resources; npm run compile; npm run headless generate
scripts.test: cross-env DEBUG=true GLOBAL_AGENT_NO_PROXY=$no_proxy GLOBAL_AGENT_HTTP_PROXY=$http_proxy node --require global-agent/bootstrap ./out/bin.js --runTest
